entries.title: Elon Musk Will Share Revenue With Twitter ‘Creators,’ If They Pay Him
entries.description: There is one idea that Elon Musk has for Twitter that on the surface, actually sounds pretty good. He subscribes to the notion that Twitter users are “creators” for the site and should get paid. Of course, in practice, the implementation of how he says he’s going to do this sounds…terrible.
